title: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view.
description:
Description: Any item in the library outline view cannot be selected the first time.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select any item.

Observed Behavior: When trying to select an item in the library outline view for the first time, the focus jumps to the library file node instead.

Expected Behavior: The selected item should be highlighted and remain selected, without the focus shifting to the library file node.

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Try to select any item in the view for the first time.
3. Observe that the focus jumps to the library file node instead of the selected item.
4. Select the same item for the second time and observe that it can be selected successfully.
